title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not update immediately.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to '18 points'.
OB: The label's height does not change when the font size is modified.
EB: After changing the font size of the label to '18 points', the label's height should adjust accordingly.
SR:
1. Add a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to '18 points'.
3. Observe that the label's height adjusts to accommodate the new font size.
